inclusion.criterion: Eligible patients that agree to participate and sign an informed consent
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: She is diagnosed with neonatal jaundice that may require phototherapy.

exclusion.criterion: Individuals with poor mental function, drug or substance abuse, or individuals with unstable psychiatric illnesses
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have been treated with any investigational drug within 30 days prior to Visit 1
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: No information provided about previous treatment with investigational drugs.

notes: Patient is a 3-day-old female infant with neonatal jaundice. She meets the inclusion criteria but there is no evidence of exclusion criteria being met.
